sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row justify="center">
    <v-dialog v-model="handleDialog" persistent width="auto">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-text>
          Are you sure you want to delete this account?
        </v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn color="deep-orange" variant="text" @click="closeDialog()">
            No
          </v-btn>
          <v-btn
            color="red"
            variant="flat"
            :loading="loader"
            @click="handleAccount(card.password_id)"
          >
            Yes
          </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
export default {
  props: ["dialog", "card", "buttonLoader"],
  watch: {
    props: {
      immediate: true,
      handler(newValue) {
        this.handleDialog = newValue.dialog;
        this.loader = newValue.buttonLoader;
      },
    },
  },

  setup(props, { emit }) {
    const handleDialog = ref(false);
    const loader = ref(false)


    function closeDialog() {
      emit("close-delete-popup", false);
    }
    // attach handle account API here
    function handleAccount(id) {
      loader.value = true;
      emit("handle-delete", { cardId: id, key: false, loader: loader.value });
    }

      return {
        handleDialog,
        loader,
        closeDialog,
        handleAccount
      }
    }
}

</script>
